title.en: Soshiki no Shukuteki to Kekkon Shitara Mecha Amai

altTitles.ja: 組織の宿敵と結婚したらめちゃ甘い

altTitles.en: It's So Sweet When I Marry My Organization's Nemesis
I Married My Organization's Arch-Nemesis, and It's So Sweet!

altTitles.pt-br: É tão doce casar com o arqui-inimigo da minha organização

altTitles.vi: Thật Ngọt Ngào Khi Kết Hôn Với Kẻ Thù Của Tổ Chức Mình

description.en:
"...I hate you!"
"What a coincidence. So do I."

The two once belonged to opposing organisations of supernatural power users, and fought for their own opposing goals. Roushi Saikawa, also known as the "Feather Hunter," and Ritsuka Yanagi, the strongest supernatural power user known as the "White Demon." The two spent their days battling each other and had no normal social experience, but...

"I love you, Rou-kun."
"Me too, Ritsuka."

After their organisation was disbanded, they somehow started dating and then got married! Is their hatred 100 times more adorable? Now, they are the epitome of a lovey-dovey couple, kissing each other at the door every morning when they go to work. But the husband had just one problem. That is, he had never shared a bed with his wife... In other words, even though he was married, he was still a virgin! This is the story of the hardships faced by such a husband, who gets caught up in numerous troubles but continues to make desperate attempts to deepen his love with his strict wife.
description.ja:
「……大っ嫌い！」
「奇遇だな。おれもだ」

　かつて敵対する異能力者の組織に属し、反目し合う目的のために抗争を繰り広げていた二人。
　《羽根狩り》の異名を持つ犀川狼士(さいがわろうし)と、《白魔》と呼ばれる最強の異能力者・柳良律花(なぎらりつか）。
　血で血を洗う毎日を過ごし、まともな社会経験のない二人だったが……

「ろうくん、大好きっ」
「俺もだよ、律花」

　組織解散後はなぜかイチャコラ付き合った上に結婚していた！
　憎さ余って可愛さ100倍？　いまや、毎朝会社に行く際に玄関で「いってらっしゃい」のチューをするくらいバカップルを地で行く夫婦。
　だが夫にはただひとつだけ悩みがあった。
　それは、妻と一度も寝床を共にしたことがないということ……要するに彼は既婚者なのにいまだ童貞であったのだ！
　これはそんな夫が数々のトラブルに巻き込まれながらも、
　身持ちのお堅い妻との愛を深めるため、今日も必死にアプローチを続ける艱難辛苦の物語である。
description.vi:
…. “ta ghét ngươi!”

“trùng hợp thay, tôi cũng vậy”

   Hai người họ từng thuộc hai tổ chức đối địch của những người sử dụng dị năng, và chiến đấu vì những mục đích trái ngược nhau.

       Saikawa Roushi, còn được gọi với cái tên là “thợ săn lông vũ”, và Yanagi Rikka, người sử dụng dị năng mạnh nhất được biết đến với cái tên “bạch ma”. Cả hai đã dành cả ngày để chiến đấu với nhau nên họ không có kinh nghiệm xã hội bình thường nào, thế nhưng…

 “em yêu anh, Rou-kun.”

“anh cũng yêu em. Rikka.”

  Sau khi tổ chức bị tan rã, bằng cách nào đó họ đã bắt đầu hẹn hò và đi đến kết hôn! Có phải sự thù hận của họ đáng yêu gấp 100 lần không? Giờ đây, họ là hình ảnh thu nhỏ của một cặp đôi yêu nhau say đắm, hôn nhau mỗi sáng trước khi đi ra ngoài.

  Nhưng người chồng có một vấn đề khá lớn, Đó là anh chưa bao giờ được ngủ chung giường với vợ mình… Nói cách khác, mặc dù đã kết hôn nhưng anh vẫn còn trinh! Đây là câu chuyện về những khó khăn mà người chồng phải đối mặt, dù vướng vào vô số rắc rối vẫn tiếp tục cố gắng để vun đắp tình yêu với người vợ nghiêm khắc của mình.
description.pt-br:
**Eu Te Odeio, Mas Também Te Amo**  

“...Eu te odeio!”  
“Que coincidência. Eu também.”  

Roushi Saikawa, conhecido como o "Caçador de Plumas", e Ritsuka Yanagi, a usuária de poderes sobrenaturais mais forte, apelidada de "Demônio Branco", pertenciam a organizações rivais que batalhavam por objetivos opostos. Durante anos, viveram enfrentando-se ferozmente, sem tempo para experiências sociais comuns.  

Mas agora…  

“Eu te amo, Rou-kun.”  
“Eu também, Ritsuka.”  

Depois que suas organizações foram desmanteladas, os dois, de alguma forma, começaram a namorar e acabaram se casando! Será que o ódio deles se tornou 100 vezes mais fofo? Hoje, eles são a personificação de um casal apaixonado, trocando beijos na porta todas as manhãs antes de irem trabalhar.  

No entanto, Roushi tinha um problema: ele nunca tinha dividido a cama com sua esposa. Em outras palavras, mesmo casado, ainda era virgem! Esta é a história das dificuldades de um marido dedicado, que enfrenta diversas confusões enquanto tenta desesperadamente fortalecer o amor com sua rígida e poderosa esposa.

altTitles.ja: 夜のまにまに

altTitles.fr: À la tombée de la nuit

description.en: Cheerful, energetic high school girl Chika and shy, reserved boy Waya couldn’t be more different. But they have a secret: every Wednesday after 9PM they meet outside the convenience store where Waya works. Bit by bit, under the light of the moon, a unique connection begins to blossom in this enchanting coming-of-age love story!
description.fr:
**À la tombée de la nuit** 

La joyeuse et énergique Chika, le timide et silencieux Waya. Ces deux-là, qui sont le jour et la nuit, discutent chaque mercredi soir devant une supérette. À la tombée de la nuit, il se rapproche peu à peu. Une histoire d'amour de jeunesse !
description.pt-br: Chika é uma garota alegre e divertida, Waya é um garoto tímido e gentil. Os dois opostos se falam apenas na loja de conveniência na quarta-feira. Uma história de amor juvenil onde eles diminuem a distância lentamente durante a noite!

description.en: Sparks fly when bumbling Prince Vain meets the enemy kingdom's royal blacksmith, Valka Voima. He might be visiting to broker peace, but that's all about building relationships, right? If only Valka would actually talk to him... Lucky for Vain, after a world-shaking theft threatens the fragile treaty between their kingdoms, the starcrossed Smity and Majesty are stuck on a run together! Will they be able to survive the shenanigans headed their way, or will they kill each other first?

altTitles.ja: 若葉さんちの青い恋

altTitles.ja-ro: Wakaba San Chi no Aoi Koi

altTitles.vi: Tình Yêu Màu Lam Nhà Wakaba

description.en: Youth romcom about 4 sisters who are all experiencing their first love at the same time. While the eldest is having a crush on the guy at her part-time work, the other three are dealing with their first romantic experiences with boys in their classes and school clubs. Every night, the four have heart-to-heart girls talks as they navigate their respective first loves.
description.ja: 若葉家四姉妹は今、全員が“初恋”の真っ最中。 長女・心春（こはる）はバイト先の先輩、 次女・真夏（まなつ）は趣味が一緒の弓道部の子、 三女・秋楽（あきら）は同じ部活の同級生、 四女・千冬は同じクラスの男子、 それぞれ好きな人に「好き」って気持ちをどう伝えようか 仲の良い四姉妹は日夜、恋のお悩み相談を繰り広げています。 四姉妹それぞれの片想いを見守る “初恋”観察ラブコメディー、開幕！ ◆作者コメント 初連載です！　がんばります！！
description.vi:
Dưới mái nhà kia, có đến bốn trái tim đang loạn nhịp!

Nhà Wakaba có bốn chị em, ai nấy đều đang tuổi xuân căng mọng, xinh đẹp vô bờ.
Và tất nhiên rồi, cái tuổi học sinh sinh viên mới nhú mà, dĩ nhiên phải có gia vị tình yêu quyện vào nó mới trọn vẹn được. Chị cả thì phải lòng tiền bối ở chỗ làm thêm, chị hai, ba và cô em út thì đang phải lòng bạn cùng trường. Và rồi cứ mỗi đêm, cả nhà lại ngồi quây quần với nhau, tâm sự chuyện yêu đương đàn đúm đủ kiểu. Liệu cặp nào sẽ bùng nổ trước đây ta?

Còn nội dung sâu xa thể nào ấy hả? Vào đọc đi rồi biết, hứa không uổng thì giờ hảo ngọt của bạn đâu!

altTitles.ja: 救済系Vッタラー✟メシアちゃん

description.en: A horror manga where viewers watch and join in on Messiah-chan's stream activities.

altTitles.en: Bottom-Tier Old Man, Living the Easy Life in Another World with Cheat Powers

description.en: Reincarnated from a bottom-tier salaryman to an adventurer, he possessed only one skill: [Game]. A seemingly dead-end second life enveloped in games even in another world…
description.ja: 底辺サラリーマンから底辺冒険者へ転生するが、持っていたスキルは【ゲーム】。異世界に来てまでゲーム三昧の、先がない二度目の人生……。

altTitles.ja: ハグして！カエルさん

altTitles.en: Give Me a Hug! Mr. Frog

description.en:
A BL story about two polar opposites in their youth♡ Takanashi, the student council president, is good-looking, smart, and admired by all the students. Recently, he has been sneaking off to a frog-branded milk tea shop - for every cup he buys, he gets a hug from a frog mascot. It's a soothing hug that relieves the pressures of everyday life. Before he knows it, he's curious about the person inside...

A classmate who seems rugged but is always there for him x A student council president who seems like a perfect superhuman but is actually too cute!

description.en:
After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!

description.ru: Продолжение популярной манги "Хвост Феи" или "Фейри Тейл", которая будет носить отдельное название "100 летний квест"! После победы над Зерефом нашу любимую, еще более сильную гильдию, ждет новое приключение! Не пропустите новые приключения популярных героев!

altTitles.pt-br: Senhorita Komi não consegue se comunicar

altTitles.zh: 古见同学有交流障碍症

description.en:
Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others.

Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.
description.es: Hitohito Tadano acaba de empezar la secundaria alta anhelando que sea pura paz y tranquilidad, pero sus planes se truncan cuando termina sentado al lado de la perfecta Shoko Komi. Ella es linda, inteligente, educada y hasta huele bien. Pero tiene 0 dotes sociales y no sabe cómo corno comunicarse con los demás. Es ahí que Tadano se sube al pony y se propone ayudarla a su compañera hasta que se haga de cien amigos, y con suerte algo más.
description.pl: Komi-san jest piękną i godną podziwu dziewczyną, od której nikt nie może oderwać oczu. Prawie cała szkoła postrzega ją jako zimne piękno, które jest poza ich zasięgiem, ale Tadano Hitohito zna prawdę: młoda piękność po prostu źle komunikuje się z innymi. Komi-san, chce to zmienić, a ma jej w tym pomóc Tadano.
description.es-la: El viaje a 100 amigos comienza con una sola conversación. El mayor sueño de la estudiante de secundaria socialmente ansiosa Shouko Komi es hacer amigos, ¡pero todos en la escuela confunden su ansiedad social paralizante con una reserva fría! Con todo el cuerpo estudiantil manteniendo su distancia y Komi incapaz de pronunciar una sola palabra, la amistad podría estar siempre fuera de su alcance. Tadano Hitohito es un chico ordinario total, y así es como le gusta. Vive para mezclarse con el fondo. Todo eso cambia cuando se encuentra solo en un salón de clases el primer día de la escuela secundaria con la legendaria Komi. Rápidamente se da cuenta de que ella no es distante, sino que tiene problemas para comunicarse con los demás. ¡Ahora ha hecho su misión ayudarla en su búsqueda para hacer 100 amigos!
description.pt-br: Komi-san é uma bela e admirável garota que ninguém consegue tirar os olhos. Quase todos da escola a veem como alguém fora do alcance, mas Tadano Shigeo sabe a verdade: **ela apenas não sabe como se comunicar com os outras pessoas**. Komi-san, que deseja corrigir este mau hábito dela, tenta melhorar com a ajuda do Tadano-kun...

title.en: Kuroiwa Medaka ni Watashi no Kawaii ga Tsuujinai

altTitles.ja: 黒岩メダカに私の可愛いが通じない

altTitles.en: Medaka Kuroiwa is Impervious to My Charms
Kuroiwa Medaka is Proof Against My Cuteness

altTitles.zh: 我的可爱对黑岩目高不管用

altTitles.ru: Куроива Мэдака не понимает моей привлекательности

altTitles.es-la: Mis encantos no funcionan con Kuroiwa Medaka

description.en:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) (U.S. Only)
description.fr:
Tu ne le sais pas encore, mais tu m’adores !

Mona plaît à tout le monde, c’est comme ça. Son sourire, son allure, sa personnalité… Tout chez elle attire les gens. Dans son lycée, elle fait tourner toutes les têtes. Sauf celle d’un garçon… Medaka. Fraîchement admis dans son école, celui-ci a complètement chamboulé la vie de cette fille à qui nul ni personne n’est censé résister. C’est bien simple : Medaka refuse de la regarder ou se renfrogne à la moindre de ses tentatives de rapprochement. Devant cette insulte à son charme ravageur, Mona décide de tout mettre en œuvre pour le séduire, quitte à se mettre dans des situations où elle-même ne saura plus quoi ressentir ! La tombeuse VS l’insensible : qui craquera en premier ? 

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.ja:
オチないアイツに、最強モテ女が大奮闘！「アイツのことなんて、ぜんっぜん好きじゃないないのに！！」

容姿端麗！ スタイル抜群！ 川井モナは、息をするようにモテる女!! しかし、そんな彼女に見向きもしない転校生・黒岩メダカの登場で、モナの学校生活は一変する！「今までずっと、チヤホヤされて生きてきたのに!!」あの手この手でメダカをオトそうと大奮闘！時にはちょっぴりカゲキなことも!?
description.ru: Куроива Мэдака родился в храме и в настоящее время является монахом, проходящим обучение. Из-за правил своего храма он не может общаться с девушками и более того, он даже не знает, как с ними общаться. Мона, "королева пчёл" школы, однако настойчиво пытается заставить его влюбиться в неё, но он всегда игнорирует её, чтобы сохранить правила своего храма.
description.es-la:
La mujer más popular del mundo lucha contra un tipo que no le gusta. ¡Ni siquiera me gusta en absoluto!

¡Buena apariencia! Estilo excepcional! ¡Kawai Mona es una mujer impresionante! Sin embargo, con la aparición de un estudiante transferido, Kuroiwa Medaka, que ni siquiera la mira, ¡la vida escolar de Mona cambiará por completo! "  Ella se ha pasado toda su vida siendo consentida y ha hecho todo lo posible por ganarse a Medaka que aveces pueder un poco radical.

¡La comedia romantica de una chica popular y un chico abstinente está a punto de estallar!
description.pt-br: Kuroiwa nasceu em um templo e atualmente é um monge em treinamento. Por causa das regras do seu templo, ele não pode interagir com garotas - e mais, nem mesmo sabe como fazer isso. Mona, a "abelha rainha" da escola, insistentemente tenta fazê-lo se apaixonar por ela, mas ele sempre a ignora a fim de se manter íntegro quanto as regras do seu templo.

altTitles.ja: よふかしのうた

altTitles.th: เพลงรักมนุษย์ค้างคาว

Khúc ca của kẻ ngụy thư

description.en:
Unable to sleep or find true satisfaction in his daily life, Yamori Kou begins wandering the night streets. He encounters a strange girl who offers to help soothe his insomnia by sleeping beside him, but it is not merely a one-way exchange…

---
- **Won the 68th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 2023, which it shared alongside Blue Orchestra**
description.fr:
Incapable de trouver le sommeil ni d'être pleinement satisfait de son quotidien‚ Yamori Kou commence à errer de nuit dans les rues. Il fait la rencontre d'une étrange fille qui l'aidera à calmer ses insomnies en dormant à ses côtés‚ mais ce ne sera pas un simple échange unilatéral…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kurokawa**
description.ja: 恋と青春は、夜に生まれる＿＿さあ、たのしい夜ふかしの時間だ！不眠が続く中２・夜守コウは、初めて一人外に出た夜、美しい吸血鬼・七草ナズナと出会う。「今日に満足できるまで、夜ふかししてみろよ。少年」彼女との二人きりの夜ふかしがコウの運命を大きく変えていく＿＿「これは、僕が、七草ナズナに恋をするための物語だ」眠れない夜を過ごす全ての人へ贈る＿＿真夜中のボーイ・ミーツ・ガール！連載開始から超絶大反響！！ふたり　たのし　よふかし　ラブストーリー開幕！！
description.ru: Не в состоянии заснуть или найти что-то позитивное в своей жизни, Ямори Кой начинает бродить по ночному городу, где он встречает странную девушку, которая предлагает ему свою помощь в борьбе с бессонницей путем сна рядом с ним.
description.uk: Позбавлений можливості спати, не задоволений своїм повсякденним життям, Ко Яморі перестає ходити до школи та береться поночі блукати вулицями. Там він зустрічає дівчину, на ім’я Надзуна Нанакуса, котра надає життю Ко нову сутність; укусом у шию і наступним перетворенням його на вампіра.
description.es-la: Incapaz de dormir o encontrar satisfacción en su vida diaria, Yamori Kou comienza a explorar la ciudad por la noche, donde conoce a una extraña chica que le ofrece ayudarle con su insomnio durmiendo a su lado.

altTitles.ja: 瀬戸さんを笑わせたい紬ちゃん

altTitles.en: Tsumugi-chan Wants to Make Seto-san Laugh

description.en:
Seto-san is a beautiful and cool class president. Her smiling face must be absolutely wonderful. I want to see it! 

This is a short comic in which Tsumugi-chan, a ditzy girl with whom Seto-san has had a little bit of contact with since the entrance ceremony, boldly tries various strategies to make Seto-san laugh — but usually fails. However, there seems to be something quite interesting about Seto-san...
description.ja: キレイでかっこいい学級委員長の瀬戸さん。笑った顔はきっと素敵なはず。……見たい！ 入学式のときからちょっと接点があったドジっ子の紬ちゃんが、果敢に瀬戸さんを笑わそうと多彩な作戦を繰り出して失敗するショートコミック。……なのだけど、瀬戸さんの様子がどうもおかしい！！！！

title.en: The Moon on a Rainy Night

altTitles.ja: 雨夜の月

altTitles.fr: The Moon on a Rainy Night (Meian)

altTitles.pt-br: A Lua em uma Noite Chuvosa

altTitles.es-la: La luna en una noche lluviosa

description.en: One rainy night, Saki is rushing to a piano lesson when she crashes into a beautiful, long-haired girl, dropping her sheet music in the process. Saki stutters an apology, but the girl simply hands back her sheet music and leaves without a word. Saki begins her first day of high school the following morning, only to find the stranger from the night before sitting at the desk next to hers. She learns that the girl’s name is Kanon and that she is not quite completely deaf, but very hard of hearing. Though Kanon needs to be close to people to read their lips, she tends to push people away with her icy demeanor. Through one kind gesture, Saki slowly begins breaking down the walls around Kanon, even as she feels something new blossoming within her.
description.ja:
2人の少女の、目には見えないもの、かけがえのないこと。

金田一咲希は高校入学直前のある日、ピアノレッスンに向かう途中で見知らぬ同世代の少女とぶつかり手を擦りむくが、相手から無言のまま真っすぐに見つめられた後、落とした楽譜を丁寧に拾われ絆創膏をもらう。咲希は印象的だったその少女とクラスメイトとして再会し、名前が及川奏音、そして耳が不自由だと知る。学校では障害を理由に周囲と距離を置く奏音に、淋しさを覚えた咲希はどうにか分かり合おうとし、そんな彼女の姿に奏音の態度も次第に変わっていき…。
description.ko: 고등학교에 입학한 사키와 귀가 불편한 반 친구 카논. 사람들과 거리를 두는 카논이 안고 있는 것과 겉으론 보이지 않는 것. 그것을 알고자 하는 사키에게 카논도 점차···. 두 소녀의 눈에는 보이지 않는 것, 둘도 없이 소중한 것.
description.pt-br: Um dia, pouco antes de entrar no colégio, Kazuki Kaneda colide com uma garota estranha da mesma geração a caminho da aula de piano e machuca sua mão, mas a partitura que caiu silenciosamente, da outra parte é cuidadosamente recolhida e um curativo é recebido. Saki se reúne com a garota impressionante como colega de classe e descobre que seu nome é Oikawa Kanon e ela é surda. Na escola, Saki, que estava sozinha, tentou entender o som de Kanon, que manteve distância do ambiente por causa de sua deficiência, e sua atitude mudou gradualmente.

description.en: After falling into the sea and going missing, Woo Young-jang returns to civilization after spending 7 years on a deserted island! His body has become firm and muscular, he can now communicate with all sorts of animals and even employ their special abilities. However, incidents and accidents seem to follow him wherever he goes. Will Young-jang be able to survive in the city, which is said to be even more terrifying than the jungle?
description.ko:
바다에 빠져 실종된 후, 무인도에서 7년 만에 살아 돌아온 우영장의 좌충우돌 문명 적응기!
그의 몸은 단단한 근육질로 변했고 온갖 동물과의 의사소통은 물론, 특별한 능력까지 구사하며 사건사고가 끊이질 않는다.
과연 영장은 밀림보다 무섭다는 도시에서 살아남을 수 있을까?

altTitles.ja: アンビバレント～童貞を捨てたら死ぬ世界～

altTitles.en: Ambivalent: A World Where Losing Your Virginity Means Death

description.en: A new type of sexually transmitted infection is spreading around the world. When infected, women's sexual desire increases by several dozen times, while 99% of men die. In a world where casual sex means death, Shindo Sadao, who is a virgin, vows not to have relations with anyone until a vaccine is developed, but the temptations of women overwhelm him!
description.ja: 新種の性感染症が世界中で流行。感染すると女性は性欲が数十倍に、男性は99%が死亡する。「安易な性行為=死」となった世界。性経験のない主人公・神童貞雄は、ワクチンが開発されるまで、誰とも関係を持たないことを誓うが、女性たちの誘惑が彼を襲いーー!?

altTitles.ja: ブラックバウンズ

description.ja:
深い深い海の底、高水圧・暗黒・低水温…ここは人跡未踏、絶望の地。

ロストテクノロジーの詰め込まれた漆黒のスーツを纏う女・リビティナと、浅海の民・ジャックのコンビが古代人類の遺物（アーティファクト）を求め、弱肉強食の危険な深淵を征く――！！

altTitles.ja: とある暗部の少女共棲

description.en:
In Academy City, where esper abilities have been recognized as a general science. Behind the peace, there is a dark side organization that undertakes missions that cannot be made public.

"Item" is an elite unit consisting of four girls. Takitsubo Rikou is able to read and track the weak power emitted by those with abilities. Frenda Seivelun, who excels in combat using explosives and traps. Kinuhata Saiai, who can manipulate nitrogen at will and plays a defensive role. And one of the 7 espers that Academy City is proud of: Mugino Shizuri. They live freely in the darkness of the Academy City, and quietly set their sights on their target...!

This is a story of encounter, friendship, and darkness that eventually leads to a 'terrible incident'!

altTitles.ja: 異世界のんびり農家

altTitles.fr: La vie de fermier dans un autre monde

altTitles.pt-br: A Vida Agrícola em Outro Mundo

altTitles.vi: Cuộc Sống Nông Dân Ở Thế Giới Khác

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
description.ja:
闘病の末に命を落とした青年・火楽は、神様によって蘇生され、若返って異世界に転移した。第二の人生を楽しむため、授けられた『万能農具』を手に、異世界で掘って伐って耕して…。

**Links:**  

- [![](https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png) Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3289ds/)
- [Official LN (JP)](http://www.fujimishobo.co.jp/sp/201803nonbiri/)
- [Alternative Raw](https://dragonage-comic.com/product/nonbiri_noka/)
description.tr: Henüz 39 yaşındayken hastalıktan ölen Machio Hiraku'ya başka bir dünyaya gitme fırsatı verilir. Kendisine güç vermek isteyen Tanrı tarafından dileği sorulduğunda sağlıklı bir bedene sahip olmayı, ikinci bir dilek olarak huzur içinde yaşamayı, üçüncü bir dilek olarak yerel dili bilmeyi ve son bir dilek olarak da çiftçi olabilmeyi seçer.

altTitles.fr: Le dragon domestique de Mme. Kobayashi

altTitles.es: La sirvienta dragón de la señorita Kobayashi

altTitles.th: น้องเมดมังกรของคุณโคบายาชิ

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン

altTitles.pt-br: A Empregada Dragão da Senhorita Kobayashi

altTitles.pt: A Empregada Dragão da Senhora Kobayashi

description.en:
Kobayashi lives alone in an apartment, until one day, Tooru appears and they end up living together. Tooru looks down on humans as inferior and foolish, but having been saved by Kobayashi-san, she does everything she can to repay the debt and help her with various things, although not everything goes according to plan.  
A mythical everyday life comedy about a hard working office lady living with a dragon girl.
description.ru: Жила себе и жила Кобаяши-сан. Одна в своей квартире, пока на пороге её дома не появилась Тору, у которой долг перед Кобаяши-сан за своё спасение. И Тору всячески желает вернуть его различными способами каждый день. Милая и повседневная комедия. Только есть одна необычная деталь: Тору – влюбленная драконесса.
description.es-la: Kobayashi vive en un apartamento cuando un dia un dragon llamado Tooru toca a su puerta. Tooru piensa que los humanos son humildes y tontos pero ella tiene una deuda con Kobayashi que la salvo en el pasado. Por eso todos los dias Tooru trata de usar sus poderes para ayudar a Kobayashi en varias cosas. Una comedia de una señora de oficina y una linda chica maid dragon viviendo juntas el día a día
description.pt-br: Kobayashi vive sozinha em um apartamento, até que um dia, Tooru, a garota dragão, apareceu e elas acabaram morando juntas. Tooru vê os humanos como seres inferiores e tolos. Mas tendo sido salva por Kobayashi-san, ela faz tudo que pode para pagar a dívida e ajudá-la com várias coisas, embora nem tudo corre conforme o planejado. Uma comédia do cotidiano mítico sobre uma mulher do escritório trabalhando duro para viver com uma garota dragão.

altTitles.ja: 七瀬さんの恋が異常

description.en: Takahashi met Nanase, a beautiful and seemingly innocent woman, on a dating app. They were steadily growing closer in their relationship until one day, when he goes to Nanase's house, he finds a shocking sight...?
description.vi: Takahashi đã gặp được Nanase, một cô gái dễ thương và trong sáng thông qua ứng dụng hẹn hò. Quan hệ của cả hai ngày càng tiến triển một cách tốt đẹp rồi bỗng dưng một ngày nọ Takahashi được Nanase mời tới nhà mình chơi và chứng kiến một cảnh tượng bất ngờ.

title.en: Tensei Shitara Akari dake ga Slime Datta Ken

altTitles.ja: 転生したらあかりだけスライムだった件

altTitles.en: That Time Only Akari Got Reincarnated as a Slime

description.en: The Amusement Club gets transported to another world... and Akari turns into a slime. A new Yuru Yuri isekai spinoff.
description.ja: 三輪車により現実味のない世界にきた4人の女子中学生。制服はそのまま、友達もいる。でも……一人だけ様子がおかしい！　行く宛もないし、お金もない。困ったけど……うーん、まぁ! なんとかなるでしょ!

altTitles.ja: 虚の記憶
虚（から）の記憶

description.en:
Between a recent move to Tokyo and the first day of high school, Rei starts his day filled with anxiety and insecurity. His nervousness accompanies him to the classroom, where amidst the classroom chatter, Rei is suddenly struck with a strange dream, followed by an aching in his chest.  
  
Once he wakes up, Rei is greeted by a small creature standing on his desk. Passing it off as part of his dream, Rei heads home. However, to his surprise, numerous other strange creatures of all shapes and sizes roam the streets, seemingly invisible to everyone else.  
  
With countless questions and the small creature from before trailing behind him, Rei's life is changed forever when he encounters a tall one-eyed figure, dressed in all black, smiling at him.
___
**Note:** This manga is based on the song of the same name.

title.en: Kono Ai wo Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.ja: この愛を終わらせてくれないか
Kono Ai o Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.zh: 能让这份爱画上休止符吗

altTitles.vi: Chấm dứt tình yêu này đi được không?

description.en: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.
description.vi:
Hachikawa Yuzu, một nữ sinh cấp 3 với cuộc đời học đường ảm đạm có một bí mật. Rằng thực chất cô ấy là một người hâm mộ cuồng nhiệt của Hayami Madoka, bạn cùng lớp và cũng là một nữ diễn viên nổi tiếng.
Yuzu, ngưỡng mộ và tôn sùng Madoka như một nữ thần, cảm thấy hạnh phúc khi chỉ đơn giản được học cùng lớp và nhìn ngắm Madoka mỗi ngày.
Lẽ ra chỉ như thế đã đủ, nhưng cho tới một ngày...
Một câu chuyện tình yêu méo mó nhưng đồng thời cũng vô cùng thuần khiết.

title.en: Neko ni wa Neko no Neko Gohan.

altTitles.ja: 猫には猫の猫ごはん。

altTitles.en: My Kitten Is a Picky Eater.

altTitles.ja-ro: Neko ni wa Neko no Nekogohan.

description.en:
A kitten lies dying in the snow. It seems that it had eaten poisoned cat food.

When our protagonist, Mano Taiyou, chanced upon the kitten, he panicked and hurriedly brought it to the vet.

After being rescued, the kitten was taken in by Taiyou and given the name Yuki. Unfortunately, Yuki has been traumatized by its near death experience from eating the poisoned cat food and is now unable to eat dry kibbles.

This a heartwarming story of Yuki the cat and his owner, Taiyou as he struggles as a beginner cook to make home made food for Yuki.

title.en: "Omae ga Kawari ni Shine" to Iwareta Watashi. Imouto no Migawari ni Reikoku na Henkyou Haku no Moto e Totsugi, Shiawase wo Teniireru

altTitles.ja: 「お前が代わりに死ね」と言われた私。妹の身代わりに冷酷な辺境伯のもとへ嫁ぎ、幸せを手に入れる

altTitles.ja-ro: "Omae ga Kawari ni Shine" to Iwareta Watashi. Imouto no Migawari ni Reikoku na Henkyou Haku no Moto e Totsugi, Shiawase wo Teniireru

description.en: Both my parents had only loved my sister and I had no place at home.  I lived my life believing that as long as I worked hard, I would someday be loved. One day, my sister received a royal order to marry a frontier count who was rumored to be ruthless. My father, who loved my sister, said to me, "You will marry into the frontier count's territory instead. But on the way, the carriage will be attacked by demons - you will die." As planned, I was attacked by monsters, but the one who rescued me was the ruthless Count of the Frontier, a beautiful man with bright red hair and sharp golden eyes...

title.en: Watashi, Shachiku Yamete Douga de Tabeteikimasu

altTitles.ja: 私、社畜辞めて動画で食べていきます

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi, Shachiku Yamete Douga de Tabeteikimasu

altTitles.en: I’m Going to Quit My Corporate Job and Make a Living from Videos

description.en:
Tired of her exhausting, thankless office work, Midorihara Mitsuha, a corporate slave, decided to quit and pursue her hobby: Making videos. She aims to bring happiness to everyone around the world with her ASMR contents, but it seems to have a different result than she'd imagined...

---
**Link:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [X (Formerly Twitter)](https://x.com/gggrande/status/1467992250118410240)
description.ja: 社畜を辞めて動画で食べていくことにした女子の話です。様々なネタで描いていければと思っています。

title.en: Asa Okitara Onnanoko ni Natteta Manga

altTitles.en: I woke up one morning as a girl Manga

altTitles.zh-hk: 早上起來變成了女孩子

altTitles.zh: 早上起来变成了女孩子

altTitles.ja: 朝起きたら女の子になってた漫画

description.en: A man wakes up one morning to find out he is now a girl - and he also now has a sister.

altTitles.ja: 怪奇人形館

description.en:
Kaiki Ningyou-kan's first appearance was in Shoujo Friend Zoukan: Suspense & Horror #1, 1992

This volume collect 6 horror stories by Kanako inuki, the first 4 all being about dolls.

- **Playing with Dolls** - O Ningyou Asobi (お人形遊び)
- **Mannequin** - (マネキン)
- **Blue Eyed Marie** - Aoi me no Mari (青い目のマリー)
- **Ventriloquist's Love** - Fukuwajutsushi to Koi (腹話術師と恋)
- **Ritual** - Gikishi (儀式)
Shoujo Friend Zoukan: Suspense & Horror #1, 1991
- **I Can Fulfill Your Love Wishes** - Koi no Negai Kanaemasu (恋の願いかなえます)
Shoujo Friend #6, 1990
description.ja: 人形にだって心があって生きている。ホラーからハートフルまで、人形をめぐる様々な物語「お人形遊び」「マネキン」「青い目のマリー」「腹話術師の恋」。仲良し４人組が自分の友情の確認のために悪魔へ約束の誓いをしてしまう「儀式」。学校で影が薄い山田みすずは恋の悩みで占いの館に寄る。そこで自分を変える手段を見つけたみすずが最後に選んだ道は…「恋の願いかなえます」。犬木可奈子の至極のオムニバスホラー群。

altTitles.ja: 冒険者ギルドの万能アドバイザー

description.en: Red is an ex-adventurer who was once the driving force in managing his party. He took care of all the busywork, such as dealing with guild requests and supplies for their adventures. Eventually, the hero declared that he was useless in battle and forcefully expelled him from the party. Having everything taken away from him, he spent his time frequenting a guild's tavern. Eventually, a young adventurer who was in trouble was saved by Red, and she begged him to take her on as an apprentice. As time went on, he realized that he had potential in training adventurers. He decided that his true calling was to be a teacher! This is a story about a jack of all trades instructor and his versatile students that will eventually become legendary adventurers who will take down the Demon King.

altTitles.ja: ちさたきがキスするだけ
おやすみモラトリアム

title.en: Hunting in Another World With My Elf Wife

altTitles.ja: 北海道の現役ハンターが異世界に放り込まれてみた 〜エルフ嫁と巡る異世界狩猟ライフ〜

altTitles.ja-ro: Hokkaidou no Gen'eki Hunter ga Isekai ni Hourikomarete Mita ~Elf Yome to Meguru Isekai Shuryou Life~

altTitles.en: An Active Hokkaidouan Hunter Is Thrown Into Another World ~A Life Of Hunting Around Another World With An Elf Wife~
An Active Hunter in Hokkaido Has Been Thrown Into a Different World

altTitles.pt-br: Caçando em Outro Mundo com Minha Esposa Elfa

altTitles.zh: 北海道的现役猎人被丢到异世界

description.en:
In modern Hokkaido a brown bear has appeared near an elementary school, so a member of the local hunters' association is dispatched to exterminate it. However he gets killed by the bear and wakes up in a fantasy world, armed with only the Remington M870 shotgun he had when he died.
___
**Character Designer:** [Yuunagi](https://mangadex.org/author/58f536f6-3ede-40cc-8b41-82efb77d1919)

**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/48586)
description.ja: 北海道で猟師をしている中島進は凶暴なヒグマから子供を助け命を落としてしまう。しかし目が覚めるとそこは異世界。無線からは女神を名乗る女性の声が…
description.pt-br: Um urso marrom apareceu perto de uma escola primária, então um membro da associação de caçadores local é enviado para exterminá-lo. No entanto, ele é morto pelo urso e acorda em um mundo de fantasia, armado apenas com a espingarda Remington M870 que tinha quando morreu.

altTitles.ja: かわいい後輩に言わされたい

altTitles.en: I Want to be Teased by a Cute Junior

altTitles.zh-hk: 可愛後輩想讓我說出口

altTitles.pt-br: Eu quero ser provocado por uma kouhai fofa

description.en: Yasu likes his kouhai, Moriyama, who is at the same time extremely assertive, deadpan, and extremely passive aggressive.
description.ja: まったく素直じゃない後輩・守山ちゃんは、自分にアプローチさせようと野洲先輩を挑発したり、時には大胆にアクションしたり…!?
description.pt-br: Yasu gosta da sua kouhai, Moriyama, que é ao mesmo tempo extremamente assertiva, inexpressiva e extremamente passiva-agressiva.

title.en: Dungeon ni Hisomu Yandere na Kanojo ni Ore wa Nando mo Korosareru

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンに潜むヤンデレな彼女に俺は何度も殺される

altTitles.en: My Yandere Girlfriend Lurks in the Dungeon and Kills Me Over and Over Again

altTitles.ko: 던전에 숨어든 얀데레 그녀에게 나는 몇 번이고 죽는다

altTitles.ru: Моя Девушка-Яндере, Прячущаяся в Подземелье, Убивает Меня Снова и Снова

altTitles.vi: Tôi bị bạn gái đâm chết hết lần này đến khác

description.en:
A fantasy story about Kiska, a boy who is mistreated by the villagers. He manages to survive thanks to his childhood friend Namia, who was the only one by his side. One day, Namia is murdered by three men, and Kiska is accused of the crime and banished to an inescapable class S dungeon. However, he finds himself in a different world where he can use "Save and Reset" to get back on his feet no matter how many times he dies. The story is about Kiska's quest for revenge against those who wronged him and his friend
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/62546)
description.ja:
何度死んだって、何度倒れたって、やり直す――！

冤罪により脱出不可能な高難易度ダンジョンの奥地へ追放された、なんの変哲もない男・キスカ。絶望する間もなく、突然モンスターに殺されるその寸前、＜セーブ＆リセット＞のスキルが付与されて……！？

altTitles.ja: 地獄くらやみ花もなき

altTitles.en: No Flowers Even in the Darkness of Hell

description.en:
A beautiful boy detective and his NEET assistant's "hell-bound" case file!

Toono Seiji, who sees criminals as monsters, meets a handsome boy, Saijou Shiroshi, who runs a consultation office in a weathered Western-style house. For some reason, he ends up working as an assistant for Shiroshi, who has excellent insight and bewitchingly good looks...
description.ru: Сэйдзи Тооно - 22-летний NEET, который может видеть истинную сущность людей в виде ёкаев. По стечению обстоятельств он устраивается работать в загадочное агентство, где можно "бесплатно получить консультацию по вашим проблемам" от таинственного мальчика по имени Сайдзё Сироси. Откуда у Сэйдзи такая способность, и почему им так заинтересовался Сироси?

altTitles.ja: 怪異と乙女と神隠し

description.en: Mysterious incidents in a city, one after the other. A demonic being is challenged to resolve them. Sumireko, seemingly a plain store clerk, aspires to be a novelist and rocks an alluring body with some ardent admirers. Adashino, an admirer who looks like a boy, is a bookstore clerk. He's steeped in mystery however, at first, until the path of challenges is revealed that he and his sister must face in the city in order to win their ticket back home, outside this world. A story of modern mysteries and romantic aspirations begins.
description.ru: Ряд загадочных инцидентов начинают происходить в городе. И всё бы ничего если этот город не был домом для Сумиреко, красивой девушки с писательским стремлением. Какие же происшествия будут ждать Сумиреко и её коллегу по работе, Адашино, полного загадок парня, работающего в книжном?
description.pt-br: Uma série de acidentes misteriosos acontecem um atrás do outro na cidade. Um ser demoníaco está desafiando a todos que os resolvam. Sumireko, uma aparentemente caixa comum de loja, deseja ser uma escritora e possui um corpo voluptuoso com muitos admiradores ardentes. Adashino, um admirador que parece com um jovem garoto é o caixa de uma livraria. Ele está mergulhado em mistérios, e de repente, o caminho pra ele e sua irmã voltarem para casa (em outro mundo) aparece. Uma história moderna de romance e aspirações começa!

altTitles.ja: エレキシード

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

description.es:
Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

description.fr:
Jiwoo est un jeune lycéen au bon coeur qui utilise ses réflexes incroyablement rapides pour rendre le monde meilleur, que ce soit en sauvant un petit enfant ou bien un animal de compagnie. Kayden est un agent secret fugitif qui finit par être enfermé dans le corps d'un... euh... vieux, gros chat tout poilu. Ensemble, et équipés des superpouvoirs de Jiwoo et de l'intelligence de Kayden, ils lutteront contre les forces obscures qui veulent que le mal domine le monde... mais seulement s'ils arrivent à bien s'entendre !

description.ru:
Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

altTitles.es-la: La Vida Después de la Muerte

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

altTitles.ja: ユーリ!!! on ICE  - Smile (Doujinshi)

description.en: Pairing: Yuuri x Viktor

Do good or go to hell. The conditions of his new curse seem simple enough for once-hopeful hoodlum Jeonji Kim. Or so it seems when his perky guardian angel shows up on his doorstep one day and heals his limp. But will simply going through the motions of helping people be enough to appease a petty god with a grudge?
description.pl: Bądź dobry lub idź do piekła. Warunki jego nowej klątwy wydają się wystarczająco proste dla niegdyś pełnego nadziei chuligana Jeonjiego Kima. A przynajmniej tak się wydaje, gdy pewnego dnia jego żwawy anioł stróż pojawia się na jego progu i leczy jego utykanie. Czy zwykłe pomaganie ludziom wystarczy, aby udobruchać małostkowego boga miejącego urazę?
description.ru:
Ты был легендой — стал никем,
Как старый лев среди шакалов.
Мечты все обратились в тлен,
Погребены среди завалов.

Увидев слабого, толкни,
Пусть и его жизнь станет адом.
Вот только даже в наши дни
Легенды оживают рядом. © RSC
description.pt-br: Faça o bem ou vá para o inferno. As condições de sua nova maldição parecem simples o suficiente para o outrora esperançoso bandido Kim Jeonji. Ou assim parece quando seu animado anjo da guarda aparece em sua porta um dia e o cura. Mas será que simplesmente fazer o que é necessário para ajudar as pessoas será o suficiente para apaziguar um deus mesquinho com rancor?

description.en: A series between the expressionless drugstore clerk, Sa-chan, and her boisterous childhood friend who's head over heels over Sa-chan but hesitant in confessing his love for her. Join them in their romcom-packed everyday life working at a drugstore.
description.fr: > Une série réunissant une employée de pharmacie sans expression, Sa-chan, et son ami d'enfance turbulent qui est fou amoureux d'elle mais qui hésite à lui avouer son amour. Accompagnez-les dans leur quotidien plein de comédie amoureuse en travaillant dans une pharmacie.
description.id: Seri antara petugas toko obat tanpa ekspresi, Sa-chan, dan teman masa kecilnya yang riuh yang jungkir balik terhadap Sa-chan tetapi ragu-ragu dalam mengakui cintanya padanya. Bergabunglah dengan mereka dalam kehidupan sehari-hari mereka yang penuh romansa bekerja di toko obat.
description.ja: ドラッグストアで働くさっちゃんとその幼なじみが両思いなんだけど、お互い気づかなくて毎日やきもきする話です。
description.pt-br: Uma série entre a inexpressiva balconista da drogaria, Sa-chan, e seu turbulento amigo de infância que está de ponta-cabeça por Sa-chan, mas hesita em confessar seu amor por ela. Junte-se a eles em sua vida cotidiana repleta de comédia romântica trabalhando em uma farmácia.

description.en:
Seongwu is a former special forces soldier who has returned to college after completing his national service. His ordinary life as a student is shattered during class one day when he and his fellow students are faced with a mysterious prompt asking them to “select a role.”

Seongwu chooses the necromancer, a rare ability that grants him the power to control the undead.

With the campus and outside world seemingly on the brink of collapse, Seongwu must use his newfound powers to battle fearsome monsters and help save his fellow students. But will they make it out alive?

description.fr:
"Quel est le métier le plus utile pour survivre dans un monde en ruine ?". Cette question apparaît devant Seong-woo alors qu'il somnole en cours. Lui et les autres étudiants ont 15 secondes pour choisir une carte parmi celles qui sont apparues devant eux. Celle choisie déterminera leurs pouvoirs qui leur permettront de survivre dans un monde chaotique, qui ressemble fortement à un jeu vidéo. Pour sa part, Seong-woo sera un nécromancien !

곧 세상이 멸망한다.
전설 속에나 나올 법한 몬스터들이 각지에 출현한다.
그리고 사람들을 잡아먹고, 길거리를 점령하며, 빌딩과 지하철에 던전을 만들기 시작한다.

멸망한 세계에서 살아남기 위해 단 한 가지 직업을 고를 수 있다.
당신은 무슨 직업을 고르겠는가?

나에게는 멸망이 무대이고, 죽음이 자산이 된다.

description.ru:
Мир на грани разрушения. Существа, упоминания о которых встречались лишь в мифах и легендах, теперь заполоняют города, обживаются под людскими жилищами и в метро, пожирая всё живое.
А что до человечества… Ему будет предложено занять новую роль в нынешнем мире выживания.
Сонву выбрал класс «некромант», и теперь трупы, что обагряют Землю, ему только на руку.

description.zh:
魔物侵袭，世界灭亡在即！
退役特种兵的降维打击！
某一天，只存在于传说中的魔物们突然出现，肆意地破坏街道、撕咬人类，并且在高楼和地铁建立起了自己的巢穴…如果在灭亡的世界，能够选择一个职业，你会选择哪种职业呢？对于身为“死灵法师”的刘成宇来说，灭亡即是舞台，丧生即为资产。

description.en: Cocochino book about Chino-chan vs AI Chino-chan!

I am a wanderer martial artist. I don’t shy away from blood, but I’m ready to retire. Should I take one last job? or not?

For many long years, he has roamed as a wandering martial artist's, living as a hired blade to make ends meet.

But now, he finds himself utterly penniless, living in poverty with nothing to his name.

As a master of martial arts at the peak level, he makes a decision, to take on one final, high-stakes mission, earn a fortune, and put an end to his life as a wanderer.

The story follows his journey as he takes on this last assignment and the unexpected twists that unfold along the way.
